data.comment: The first-half is under way at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium - Birmingham kick-off to start the match.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Arnaut Danjuma.
In the minute 38, Jason Tindall is making the team's first substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Dan Gosling replacing Lewis Cook.
It's now 0-2 in Birmingham as David Brooks scores for Bournemouth.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, It's Bournemouth with the kick-off after the break.
Bournemouth take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to David Brooks.
The home team have replaced Riley McGree with Jeremie Bela. This is the first substitution made today by Aitor Karanka.
In the minute 55, Scott Hogan (Birmingham) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-3.
Mikel San Jose (Birmingham) gets a yellow card.
Junior Stanislas (Bournemouth) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Lukas Jutkiewicz is booked for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 1-3.
